resume.header:
** Summary:
Creative and experienced professional bringing superior design and debugging capabilities, innovative problem solving skills and dedication to quality *** Skills: Languages and Software Technology **** Languages: in general order of familiarity: * Python, SQL Server, XML, PHP, MySQL, Ruby, Javascript, .NET, HTML5, CSS3, Unix/Linux, Cygwin, Power Shell, SQLite, MS Access (VBA), VB, VBScript **** Software: * Expertise in Salesforce, Sharepoint, Wordpress, Spiceworks, Git, SQL Server Management Studio, Virtualization, Crystal Reports, Microsoft Office (Including MS Access), OpenOffice (extending in Basic and Python) Windows, Linux/Posix, Visual Studio, Eclipse, Emacs, Vim and Joomla *** Accomplishments
**** Currently in Progress (On-going)
-
Pending Certification in MSCA ( Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate) MSSQL Server and Windows Server Administration
Current Development of Automated Resume/CopyWriting System using Python, SQL Server, XML and Javascript.
Current development of MS SQL Server SSIS in Visual Studio as a general development coding platform (visual operational automation scripting for moving and transforming XML and YAML formatted data with Ruby scripts to MSSQL Server database
Past multiple Projects for RGNterprises, TSSG, Automated Income Master Mind and Flat Penny Bar and Grill involving multiple technologies in full stack web development, Big Data Analytics, Software QA Automation, DevOps, Networking and Internet Marketing. Please see https://linkedin/in/raynieva for more detailed information
**** At the largest company of its kind(Septic, Plumbing and Grease Disposal)
Programming/Data Import of New Company Merger Acquistions Using Python/Pandas, SQL Server involving small to medium size companies ranging $500,000 to $1,000,000 annualized revenue and above.
**** Product Technical Support for a Global Company that develops Marketing Automation/Variable Data Printing/Flexible web-to-print platforms **** Itemized Functions:
Interface with product engineering to develop new features and bug fixes based on customer needs
Resolve, debug and document customer issues as related to the Pageflex technology stack (see below)
Developed Custom Storefront Deployment (automation) (Using Pageflex to document and control Pageflex)
Re-build and emulate customer platforms using virtualization to resolve customer issues
Resolve SMTP, network and firewall issues as related to Pageflex operations **** Itemized Technology Stack:
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows IIS Web Server, Pageflex Server
SQL Server (backups, restores, queries) SQL Server 2005, 2008, 2012 and 2014 (clustered)
VMWare ESXi (vCenter Server and vSphere Client)
Graphics and Font technology, Adobe Indesign on MAC as related to Pageflex Support
Javascript, Vbscript and XML command packet API
Pageflex Studio, Pageflex Storefront, ASP.Net platform, Salesforce, Lotus Notes, Slack, Sharepoint **** Currently in Progress (On-going) Multiple Projects for RGNterprises, TSSG, Automated Income Master Mind and Flat Penny Bar and Grill involving multiple technologies in full stack web development, Big Data Analytics, Software QA Automation, DevOps, Networking and Internet Marketing. Please see https://linkedin/in/raynieva for more detailed information
**** Working for the largest Foodservice GPO in the nation * Development of (SQL) SQLite /Ditto automated data entry system using Ruby / VB / MS Access. for interfacing with cloud platform technologies * Facilitated introduction of Sidekick/Hubspot(TM) (email sales/marketing superpower tracking) * Improved storage performance significantly for massive Teamdrive(TM) filesystem (250,000 document files) by moving to a no-sync strategy. * Facilitated email migrations for 3 sister companies * Design, development and administration of 3 different VOIP systems using VonageBusiness(TM) for each separate company brand. * In capacity of Information Engineer, Salesforce(TM) development of 8000+ to date ticketing system and integration to Spiceworks Technology * Also lead development of Product/Asset inventory system using same technologies.* Design and development of Intranet Web site using Wordpress and Salesforce/Sharepoint Integration. **** Itemized
Development of (SQL) SQLite /Ditto automated data entry system using Ruby / VB / MS Access for interfacing with cloud platform technologies
Facilitated introduction of Sidekick/Hubspot(TM) (email sales/marketing superpower tracking)
Improved storage performance significantly for massive Teamdrive(TM) filesystem (250,000 document files) by moving to a no-sync strategy
Facilitated email migrations for 3 sister companies

In capacity of Information Engineer, Salesforce(TM) development of 8000+ to date ticketing system and integration to Spiceworks Technology
Also lead development of Product/Asset inventory system using same technology (Salesforce)
Design and development of Intranet Web site using Wordpress and Salesforce/Sharepoint Integration.
**** At the largest community based newspaper company in NE (parent company is largest in nation) **** Itemized
Recently Administrative, operational support (running jobs and Disaster Recovery) and SARBOX reporting of legacy mission critical Unix IBM/AIX (Always On no-downtime) system for mainframe style ISAM database circulation system (150 daily and weekly newspapers). ISAM is the non-relational forerunner of such implementations as IBMs DB2, MS Access and the open source MySQL.
Recently Developed and implemented single key and shortcut key activated operational automation scripts for UNIX CSH shell and Red Hat Cygwin/X Bash shell user interface for running mission critical update\backup database job streams and database restore interface Internet
*Working for business applications group support/developed a variety of time saving automated production and system adminstration/automation solutions using multiple programming languages (web and client/server desktop) technologies. * Involved in conversion of advertising systems/products from Enterprise News Media (35 papers) acquisitions to Miles advertising system. * Monitoring and system maintenance of mission critical business systems for advertising, sales, finance and production. * Design and development of Joomla/MediaWiki based intranet website for IT documentation and communication. Design, development of automated Insert Tracking System for print and deliver operations. Design/development Helpdesk Database.
